events.message: I received my order last week but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I no longer need it.
The customer's issue has been categorised under the Refund cluster based on their request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and reason for the refund request so I can process it accordingly?
My order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the item is not what I expected and I changed my mind.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund request, and you should receive the full amount back in 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for handling my refund quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to the money being returned.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming that the refund process has started successfully.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
The refund case has been closed as the customer confirmed successful receipt of the refund and expressed satisfaction.
